Reason: The configuration option ANALYZE_SAMPLE is considered performance-sensitive. This is because the sample size specified in the ANALYZE_SAMPLE configuration directly affects the efficiency and accuracy of table analysis at the system level. A higher sample size can lead to more accurate results but may also increase processing time and resource usage, while a lower sample size may result in faster analysis but with potentially less accurate results.
